resources.string: Our company is an established Pest control organization with an aim to ensure you have a comfy home.We have served over a 1000+ customers who have given us positive remarks. Our services are human and environmental friendly.We are located on Safari Drive 123. We are certified by the Ministry of Health Department and the Insect Research Institute.
